caption.center: Elvin HEMPHILL et al. v. Beatrice PATTERSON, Individually and Frank
Callahan, Executor of Estate of Anner White Hemphill, Deceased.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Tunica County; Harvey T. Ross, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
Thomas, Price, Alston, Jones Davis, Charles R. Davis, Jackson, for appellants.
Tucker Tucker, Jack N. Tucker, Tunica, for appellees.
opinion.panel: Before SMITH, P.J., and LEE and BOWLING, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
REVERSED AND REMANDED.
PATTERSON, C.J., ROBERTSON, P.J., and SUGG, WALKER, BROOM and COFER, JJ., concur.
